mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movie ( movie_id, movie_ko_nm, movie_en_nm, movie_pr_dt, movie_runtime, movie_open_dt, movie_plot, movie_audience_cnt, movie_language, movie_awards, show_type, movie_type, genre, watch_grade, rated_yn, keywords, filming_location, country_cd, frst_reg_date ) VALUES ( #{movieId}, #{movieKoNm}, #{movieEnNm}, #{moviePrDt}, #{movieRuntime}, CAST(#{movieOpenDt} AS DATE), #{moviePlot}, #{movieAudienceCnt}, #{movieLanguage}, #{movieAwards}, #{showType}, #{movieType}, #{genre}, #{watchGrade}, #{ratedYn}, #{keywords}, #{filmingLocation}, #{countryCd}, NOW() )
insert into movie_country ( country_cd, frst_reg_date ) values ( #{countryCd}, NOW() )

insert into production ( production_id, production_ko_nm, production_en_Nm, logo_file_id, production_country, frst_reg_date ) values
( #{prod.productionId}, #{prod.productionKoNm}, #{prod.productionEnNm}, #{prod.productionLogoFileId}, #{prod.productionCountry}, NOW() )

insert into movie_production ( production_id, movie_id, frst_reg_date ) values
( #{prod.productionId}, #{prod.movieId}, NOW() )

insert into file ( file_id, file_path, file_upload_dt, file_typ_cd, frst_reg_date ) values
( #{file.fileId}, #{file.filePath}, NOW(), #{file.fileTypCd}, NOW() )

INSERT INTO cast_img ( cast_id, cast_logo_file_id, frst_reg_date ) VALUES
( #{cast.castId}, #{cast.castLogoFileId}, NOW() )

INSERT INTO "cast" ( cast_ko_nm, cast_en_nm, gender, cast_birth, cast_death, cast_nationality, cast_filmography, frst_reg_date ) VALUES
( #{cast.castKoNm}, #{cast.castEnNm}, #{cast.gender}, #{cast.castBirth}, #{cast.castDeath}, #{cast.castNationality},
#{cast.castFilmographyStr, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NULL,
NOW() )

INSERT INTO movie_cast ( cast_id, movie_id, cast_department, role_ko_nm, role_en_nm, frst_reg_date ) VALUES
( #{cast.castId}, #{cast.movieId}, #{cast.castDepartment}, #{cast.roleKoNm}, #{cast.roleEnNm}, NOW() )

INSERT INTO crew ( crew_id, crew_ko_nm, crew_en_nm, gender, crew_birth, crew_death, crew_nationality, crew_filmography, crew_biography, frst_reg_date ) VALUES
( #{crew.crewId}, #{crew.crewKoNm}, #{crew.crewEnNm}, #{crew.gender}, #{crew.crewBirth}, #{crew.crewDeath}, #{crew.crewNationality}, #{crew.crewFilmography}, #{crew.crewBiography}, NOW() )

INSERT INTO movie_crew ( crew_id, movie_id, crew_department, crew_role, crew_director_yn, frst_reg_date ) VALUES
( #{crew.crewId}, #{crew.movieId}, #{crew.crewDepartment}, #{crew.crewRole}, #{crew.crewDirectorYn}, NOW() )

( #{crew.crewId}, #{crew.castLogoFileId}, NOW() )

INSERT INTO soundTrack_img ( soundtrack_id, album_file_id, frst_reg_date ) VALUES
( #{track.soundtrackId}, #{track.albumFileId}, NOW() )

INSERT INTO soundTrack ( soundtrack_id, movie_id, album_id, album_nm, duration_ms, song_nm, artist_nm, frst_reg_date ) VALUES
( #{track.soundtrackId}, #{track.movieId}, #{track.albumId}, #{track.albumNm}, #{track.durationMs}, #{track.songNm}, #{track.artistNm}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT movie_id, movie_ko_nm, movie_en_nm, movie_open_dt FROM movie WHERE -- 원문 한글/영문명 검색 movie_ko_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{term}, '%') OR movie_en_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{term}, '%') -- 초성 검색 (예: ㄷㅇㅁㄱ) OR movie_ko_nm_initials LIKE CONCAT('%', #{termInitials}, '%') -- 자모 검색 (예: ㄷ ㅐ ㅎ ㅏ ㄴ ㅁ ㅣ ㄴ ㄱ ㅡ ㄱ) OR movie_ko_nm_jamo LIKE CONCAT('%', #{termJamo}, '%') ORDER BY movie_open_dt DESC LIMIT 200
